11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Sa'eed bin Al-Musayyab narrated from Sa'b bin Abi Waqqas:"The Messenger of Allah refused Uthman bin Ma'zun (when he asked) regarding celibacy, and if he had permitted it for him, then we would have castrated ourselves

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي النَّهْىِ عَنِ التَّبَتُّلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Prohibition Of Celibacy
